name: The Outliners
detailed_description:
Stick Game is a simple and very fast-paced multiplayer round-based card game developed by two high school students. Players can customize skill sets using large amounts of interesting skills and use it to dominate the game. Some skills can form combos with others and while other skills have destructive side effects in some specific skill set. Thus, never stop trying and revising the skillset in the countless PVP fights.
PS: The game's dev don't like P2P, so the game is COMPLETELY FREE and has NO IN-GAME PURCHASE.

- Fast matches that finish in about 3 mins

- Easy to start, hard to master

- Completely free with no in-game purchase

short_description: Stick Game is a simple and very fast-paced multiplayer round-based card game. Players can customize skill sets using large amounts of interesting skills and use it to dominate the game.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: Literally any processor that still runs
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any video card that can run flash games
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Almost every sound cards are qualified
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i7 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Almost every sound cards are qualified
  • Additional Notes: I developed the game in this enviroment :)

legal_notice: The developers don't know how to fill this copyright space, and like to provide any instruction needed if someone thinks that this game is fun and want to make a small clone.
